solution_line_template: It rained for a total of {march_rain}+{april_rain}+{may_rain}+{june_rain}+{july_rain} = <<{march_rain}+{april_rain}+{may_rain}+{june_rain}+{july_rain}={total_rain}>>{total_rain} inches

The rain period is from March through July for a total of {num_months} months so the average rainfall is {total_rain}/{num_months} = <<{total_rain}/{num_months}={average_rainfall}>>{average_rainfall} inches of rain per month
